Hero.title: I'm Philipe
Hero.paragraph: Creator of innovative, creative and user-centric solutions. I believe that technology can improve lives and inspire people.
Hero.dialogDescription: Select a contact option and you will be redirected to talk to me!

Projects.title: Selected Projects
Projects.StellarDescription: The company of the future! A spectacular and creative website to authenticate your brand.
Projects.OnPholioDescription: Tool created to help manage texts and images for websites.
Projects.PathwayDescription: Financial monitoring app with dynamic goal setting.
Projects.NimbusDescription: A complete management platform for insurance brokers and plans.
Projects.MatcherDescription: From Gamers to Gamers, championship brackets for Teamfight Tactics matches.

Footer.title: Talk to me!
Footer.paragraph: If you would like to discuss a project, please email me and I will get back to you shortly.
Footer.toastDescription: Now you can talk to me!
